item.source: Adding 602 animation & gfx to protect item

item.title: Adding 602 animation & gfx to protect item
item.dc:creator: @zoomer zoomer
item.description:
@zoomer wrote:

Okay so I decided to do this since other people wont do this for there own PI base I know this is not much of a tutorial but I don’t know where snippets go so here we go.

Hard/Easy - 1/10
C&P
Brains to copy & past
Base - PI

This could of been done a way better way with conventions but hey I got it right?

Requirements - 602 animations & gfx.

First go to your clickingbuttons.java

Then add this case in

/**Prayers**/ case 87231: // Protect Item if(c.trade11 > 1) { for(int p = 0; p < c.PRAYER.length; p++) { // reset prayer glows c.prayerActive[p] = false; c.getPA().sendFrame36(c.PRAYER_GLOW[p], 0); } c.sendMessage("You must wait 15 minutes before using this!"); return; } c.getCurse().activateCurse(0); c.gfx0(2213); c.startAnimation(12567); break;

This will give your protect item a gfx & animation like runescape’s. It also doesn’t allow you to use this pray within the next 15 minutes after logging in.

All flaming/trolling will be reported please stay on topic.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding 602 animation & gfx to protect item
